subject: Remove Review
description_text:
I hope you guys don’t think I’m done. You still need to remove my positive
review. Just press the same button you use to remove my negative reviews.

I’m up to 13 confirmed sales that I have cost you between my reddit posts,
iracing leagues, and people I personally know. There are likely more that
were on the fence between you and another brand that I have swayed, that I
don’t know about. That’s over $2000 in sales because you wanted to falsely
advertise a coupon and not honor it for $17. When you remove my review and
properly apologize for this, I will remove my posts trashing your company.

I’ve got a long rainy weekend coming up where I’ll have some extra time to
continue spreading the word about how you treat customers. I’ll probably
get into some other forums and threads I haven’t worked on yet. Still
waiting for the government to reopen so I can file some complaints with the
proper agencies about violating the Truth in Advertising laws.

This could all stop with the click of a button. It could have never started
if you honored the ad discount you emailed me. $17 versus $2000+ along with
continuous bad publicity for a company whose products people are very iffy
about purchasing in the first place.

See you this weekend on the forums!
